IndexPage.title: Next.js starter
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

Documentation.Intent: Build integrations that can handle complex payment flows. The status of the payment flow changes as the PaymentIntent progresses from creation to the entire checkout process. This API tracks the payment status throughout the process and triggers additional validation steps as needed.
Documentation.Checkout: Checkout is a low-code, pre-built payment form that can be hosted by Stripe or embedded in your website. Checkout uses the Checkout Sessions API. You can use the API with Stripe Elements to build a more personalized checkout experience.

form.extraInfo: Extra information, not included in the Stripe payment element, business defined
Extra information, not included in the Stripe payment element, business defined
